channel.title: Tips on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on inSileco

item.title: A few thoughts about pipes in R
item.description:
Piping in R

Back in 2014, I discovered the forward pipe for R introduced in magrittr and since that time, I never stopped piping, although my piping habits evolved over time, especially with the introduction of the native pipe in R 4.1.

item.title: Trick or Tips 005 {R}
item.description:
Trick or Tips

Ever tumbled on a code chunk that made you say: "I should have known this f_ piece of code long ago!" Chances are you have, frustratingly, just like we have, and on multiple occasions too. In comes Trick or Tips!
